label_appear_delay.componentleveltooltip: Appear Delay||The delay before sticky tooltips appear. This delay should stop tooltips you don't intend to view from appearing when briefly mousing over their spawning element.

label_removal_delay.componentleveltooltip: Hide Delay||The time it takes for a stuck tooltip to disappear. This delay begins when your cursor is no longer hovering the tooltip or the element that spawned it. This will stop tooltips disappearing if you briefly mouse off them.

label_stick_delay.componentleveltooltip: Stick Delay||The delay between a tooltip appearing and it sticking. If you mouse off before this delay has finished (indicated by the fire), the tooltip will disappear. When stuck, tooltips can be inspected.

component_text.text: Hover Karl to test the options you have set (Apply required).

label_pin_to_element.componentleveltooltip: Pin to Element||Pins the tooltip to the side of the element that spawned it. When disabled, it will follow your mouse cursor until stuck.

label_auto_stick.componentleveltooltip: Auto-Stick||Makes tooltips automatically stick after the Stick Delay specified below.

stick_delay_disabled_blocker.componentleveltooltip: Stick delay will not be used with auto-stick disabled

component_text.text: Sticky Tooltips can be stuck at any time with the "Stick Tooltip" keyboard shortcut.
